Text: Live at Montreux 2011:  This concert was recorded at the Montreux Jazz Festival on 16 July 2011.

Text: Live at Montreux 2011:  Besides a 2CD release, the concert film has also been released on DVD and Blu-ray.

Text: Live at Montreux 2011:  All formats were released on 7 November 2011 by German label Eagle Rock Entertainment.

Text: Live at Montreux 2011:  In 2015 a vinyl collector's edition of the album was released for a Record Store Day.
